channel.title: How do I make a NPC drop items that I want?
channel.description: How do I make a NPC drop items that I want? :confused:[br][size=1]Posted on: November 15, 2007, 03:02:11 PM[/size][hr]?

item.title: How do I make a NPC drop items that I want?
item.dc:creator: @Element_SoftwareTM Element SoftwareTM
item.description:
@Element_SoftwareTM wrote:

yes but there only two things in it?[br][size=1]Posted on: November 15, 2007, 03:59:36 PM[/size][hr]How and where do I add the npcstuff in this file…npcdrops.java…

[code]public class NPCDrops {
public int npcId;
public int DropType;
public int[] Items = new int[100];
public int[] ItemsN = new int[100];

public NPCDrops(int _npcId) {
	npcId = _npcId;
	for (int i = 0; i < Items.length; i++) {
		Items[i] = -1;
		ItemsN[i] = 0;
	}
}

}
[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: November 15, 2007, 04:03:20 PM[/size][hr]Listen all I want to do is make, Choas Elemental, drop all rares, including allphats, santa, andall masks, and if sum 1 make the code for me and if itworks, ill rep[br][size=1]Posted on: November 15, 2007, 04:06:27 PM[/size][hr]…

Read full topic

item.title: How do I make a NPC drop items that I want?
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

Being the CFG folder, there will be .cfg files in there. Your looking for NPCdrops.java not .CFG.

item.title: How do I make a NPC drop items that I want?
item.dc:creator: @Element_SoftwareTM Element SoftwareTM
item.description:
@Element_SoftwareTM wrote:

it wont drop[br][size=1]Posted on: November 15, 2007, 03:40:19 PM[/size][hr]Look I go to CFG folder, and click npcdrops, and when I add the item and the npc id and stuff, and save then compile, it wont drop idk why, i tryed even attacking tonsof times, and my npcdrop.java hasnothing in it accept this…

[code]public class NPCDrops {
public int npcId;
public int DropType;
public int[] Items = new int[100];
public int[] ItemsN = new int[100];

public NPCDrops(int _npcId) {
	npcId = _npcId;
	for (int i = 0; i < Items.length; i++) {
		Items[i] = -1;
		ItemsN[i] = 0;
	}
}

}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make a NPC drop items that I want?

item.title: How do I make a NPC drop items that I want?
item.dc:creator: @jcrane164 jcrane164
item.description:
@jcrane164 wrote:

You cant really make them drop the thing you want at a particular time you have to put one item in “npcdrops.java” to make it drop one item.

It will prolly say somthing like this

//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount-- npcID = 1032 4151 1 [ENDOFNPCDROPLIST]

To make it drop two you have to go in the same file and put it in there for several spots like this

It will prolly say somthing like this

//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount-- npcID = 1032 4151 1 4151 1 [ENDOFNPCDROPLIST]

if those dont work im sorry…

But if they do please [size=6pt]rep[/size] me

Read full topic
